messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE FILE: Sigma-473 DATE: 03/15/39  There's been a mysterious disappearance of wild animals from the Eden Nature Reserve. Park rangers reported several exotic species missing over the past month.  LAW ENFORCEMENT ENGAGEMENT:  CASE MANAGER: Captain U. V. Hall is overseeing the investigation, focusing on possible illegal wildlife trafficking. FORENSIC TEAM: Detectives W. X. Rivera and Y. Z. Chung are examining the areas where the animals were last seen for any traces or clues. INTELLIGENCE: Detectives A. B. Foster and C. D. Hughes are investigating any connections to the illegal wildlife trade networks. PATROL: Patrol Officers E. F. Grant, G. H. Lawson, and I. J. Perez are conducting nightly surveillance in various parts of the reserve to catch the culprits in action. COMMUNICATION: Lieutenant K. L. Ortiz is liaising with local communities and tribes, gathering information and raising awareness. ADDITIONAL DETAILS:  A suspicious vehicle has been spotted multiple times near the reserve's southern gate during late hours.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.
